values.value: The water level above a fixed measuring point, i.e., above the station Gauge Datum, in metres.
values.quality_code: The quality code, rating, of the measure.
values.catchment_id: The identification code of the catchment wherein the measuring station resides.
values.gauge_datum: The reference point of a gauge site, in metres.
values.on_river: If the measuring station is on a river 1, otherwise 0.

rating.key: The quality code of a measure.
rating.code: The leter code of a measure.
rating.description: The description of the key and code.

assets.catchment_id: The identification code of the catchment wherein the measuring station resides.
assets.catchment_name: The name of the catchment wherein the measuring station resides.
assets.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
assets.ts_name: The name of the time series with respect to its granularity.
assets.from: The date of the earliest record, yyyy-mm-dd.
assets.to: The date of the latest record, at retrieval time, yyyy-mm-dd.
assets.stationparameter_no: The letter code of the measurable enviromental characteristic, e.g., SG, i.e., Staffing Gauge, denotes water level relative to a local datum.
assets.river_id: If the station resides on a river, the identification code of the river.
assets.gauge_datum: The reference point of a gauge site, in metres.
assets.on_river: If the measuring station is on a river True, otherwise False.
